overview: Kitty presents the World Premiere of her latest stand-up special 'Smashing', streamed directly to your home. Filmed live before lockdown at the Riverside Theatre, don't miss this one night only live on-line comedy event!  Love songs, sex, algorithms, chimps, clowns and psychics, everything is getting "smashed". Smashing. It's fun AND learning. Maybe get the kids out of the house for this one, unless you fancy them getting a real Flanagan style education.
title: Kitty Flanagan: Smashing
